establish-connection.title: Establish connection
establish-connection.instructions: Scan the QR code with your digital wallet to open a new connection.
establish-connection.error-message: Sorry, there was a problem displaying the QR Code...

accept-offer.title: Accept offer
accept-offer.instructions: Go to your personal digital wallet and accept the offer for the verifiable credential.

processing.title: Processing state:
processing.accept-proposal: Accept the proposal for the verifiable credential.

result.title: Success!
result.instructions: You have now successfully obtained a verifiable credential, which is now stored in your personal digital wallet.
